name: Rick Survival
description:
Action RPG • Free Game

Explore Official Website »

Survive and destroy thousands of monsters

This is an Action-Rogulike survival game with RPG elements. The game is set in different dimensions, where you have to survive against ever-growing hordes of monsters.

Trailer · Gameplay Video · Download

Slay monsters wherever you are

There is no place to hide, all you can do is try to survive all the waves of monsters and collect as much gold as possible for your next survival before death inevitably puts an end to your struggle.

11 exciting dimensions with various enemies

Rick's Land, Plumbubo, Dirty Earth, Dupido, Permafrost, September 3 Again, Planet Nibiru, Desert, Blue Planet, Ashes and Swamp

46 different Ricks and more than 30 unique weapons

Pickle Rick, Commander Rick, Bald Rick, Baloney Rick, Robot Rick, Tiny Rick, Battler Rick, Ninja Rick. Weapons: Pistol, Rifle, Gauss Cannon, Blaster, Revolver, Plasmogun, Machine Gun, Machine Gun, Shuriken, and Rocket Launcher.

Upgrade your Rick with 7 characteristics

Health regeneration, maximum health, body damage, bullet speed, weapon damage, reload and movement speed

It's time to fight new monsters

Strange creatures await in Rick Survival. Be wary of what lurks in these dimensions. Work your way through competitions, complete tasks, improve your skills and destroy other monsters.

Immerse yourself in a crazy adventure

Rick is once again besieged by hordes of monsters, and he can't survive without your help. Download the game for FREE!
